code: var day=new Date().getDay();var date=new Date().getDate();var allDate=[];var month=new Date().getMonth()+1;var year=new Date().getFullYear();for(var i=1;i<=31;i++){allDate.push(i);}var currentStartDay=new Date(month+"-"+date+"-"+year).getTime();var currentEndDay=new Date(month+"-"+date+"-"+year).getTime()+86399999;var currentStartDayOfMonth=new Date(year,month-1,1).getTime();var currentEndDayOfMonth=new Date(year,month,0).getTime()+86399999;var previosdateStart=currentStartDay-86400000;var previosdateEnd=previosdateStart+86399999;var dateValue={day:day,date:date,allDate:allDate,month:month,year:year,currentStartDay:currentStartDay,currentEndDay:currentEndDay,currentStartDayOfMonth:currentStartDayOfMonth,currentEndDayOfMonth:currentEndDayOfMonth,reFormatDate:function reFormatDate(time){var dateFormated='';dateFormated+=new Date(time).getFullYear()+"-";if(new Date(time).getMonth()+1<10){dateFormated+='0'+(new Date(time).getMonth()+1)+"-";}else{dateFormated+=new Date(time).getMonth()+1+"-";}if(new Date(time).getDate()<10){dateFormated+='0'+new Date(time).getDate();}else{dateFormated+=new Date(time).getDate();}return dateFormated;},previosdateStart:previosdateStart,previosdateEnd:previosdateEnd};export default dateValue;
